name: Puzzle Sisters:Foer 谜题姐妹：菲迩
name_original: Puzzle Sisters:Foer 谜题姐妹：菲迩
description:
The Puzzle Sisters suddenly crippled, just remember the problem but forgot the answer, smart buddy come and help her answer questions Puzzle Sisters!



Game features:
The happy virtual image appears differently depending on the player's answer.
Complete answer 100 questions, unlock rich illustrations.
The answer to screening innovative gameplay, game player repeated questions, increase the degree of mind.
Topics covering a wide range of interesting questions library.
Gain knowledge and pleasure in the game.
Game player can use the free creative workshop outstanding questions, selected topics become the official DLC, and give out rewards.
Chinese dubbing with cute girls.
Long term content updates.
